books.title: Early Autumn
books.author: Louis Bromfield
books.summary: An old money family in Massachusetts faces a rapidly changing environment after World War I.

books.title: The Defiant Agents
books.author: Andre Norton
books.summary: Rival colonies are stranded on an alien world, their memories mixed with those of their ancestors and pitted against each other by the Western and Soviet forces who sent them.

books.title: Elizabeth and Her German Garden
books.author: Elizabeth von Arnim
books.summary: The English wife of a German aristocrat recounts, through a series of diary entries, a year spent revitalizing the neglected garden of their estate.

books.title: Queen Victoria
books.author: Lytton Strachey
books.summary: A sardonic and generally unflattering biography of Victoria Alexandrina, Queen of England.

books.title: The Story of the Treasure Seekers
books.author: E. Nesbit
books.summary: Six siblings search for treasure in order to restore their lost family fortune.

books.title: Nonsense Books
books.author: Edward Lear
books.summary: A collection of literary nonsense in the forms of limericks, songs, and short stories.

books.title: Henry VI, Part II
books.author: William Shakespeare
books.summary: King Henry VI marries Margaret of Anjou and further stokes discord within his court.

books.title: The Charwoman’s Shadow
books.author: Lord Dunsany
books.summary: A young nobleman becomes a magician to secure his sister’s marriage.

books.title: Erewhon Revisited
books.author: Samuel Butler
books.summary: A traveler returns to the country of Erewhon to find out what has happened in the twenty years since he last visited.

books.title: The Dark Other
books.author: Stanley G. Weinbaum
books.summary: A young woman seeks the reason behind her lover’s outbursts of cruelty.

books.title: The Bolshevik Myth
books.author: Alexander Berkman
books.summary: A left-wing radical records his experiences in revolutionary Russia.

books.title: The Sign of the Four
books.author: Arthur Conan Doyle
books.summary: An analytical detective is consulted by a young woman who has received a strange communication regarding her long-missing father and a mysterious treasure.

books.title: The Origin of Species
books.author: Charles Darwin
books.summary: A distinguished amateur scientist lays out the evidence for the origin of species by means of natural selection.

books.title: Heretics
books.author: G. K. Chesterton
books.summary: A collection of essays in which G. K. Chesterton debates the intellectuals of his day on a range of topics.

books.title: Poetry
books.author: T. S. Eliot
books.summary: A collection of T. S. Eliot’s poetry, including “The Love Song of J. Alfred Prufrock,” “The Waste Land,” and “The Hollow Men.”

books.title: Candide
books.author: Voltaire
books.summary: A witty satire that tells of the young Candide’s attempts to stay optimistic through a series of incredible hardships.

books.title: Plague of Pythons
books.author: Frederik Pohl
books.summary: A man navigates a world torn apart by bouts of spontaneous, unexplained possessions.

books.title: Mr. Mulliner Stories
books.author: P. G. Wodehouse
books.summary: A collection of short stories featuring the eccentric (and hilarious) Mr. Mulliner, who regales the patrons of the Anglers’ Rest with tales of his colorful and amusing relatives.

books.title: Practical Mysticism
books.author: Evelyn Underhill
books.summary: Evelyn Underhill makes the case that mysticism is accessible and beneficial to everyone.

books.title: The Cruise of the Alerte
books.author: E. F. Knight
books.summary: An English journalist sets sail in search of treasure buried on a remote desert island.
